name: Woodcutter Survival
description: Woodcutter survival is an interesting, sometimes hardcore game. Here you have only one goal - to survive! You have to get resources, create new weapons and tools to fight wolves and bears. Don't forget to eat on time or you'll die! Build shelters, make thorns and traps, upgrade the mine to get more and more new resources, cut down trees, plant new ones, because enemies will not spare you! This and much more you can try in Woodcutter survival! Download now!!
